meanings.definition: A small amount of liquid medication dispensed from a dropper into the eye.
meanings.sent1: I used an eyedrop to soothe my itchy eye.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an eyedrop for my eye infection.
meanings.sent3: When I accidentally put an eyedrop in my coffee instead of sugar, it tasted terrible.
meanings.sent4: Her tears fell like eyedrops, one by one, onto the paper.
meanings.sent5: The eyedrop felt cool and refreshing as it touched my eye.

meanings.definition: To administer liquid medication into the eye using a dropper.
meanings.sent1: I carefully eyedrop the medicine into my eye every morning.
meanings.sent2: She eyedrops her eyes before going to bed.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could eyedrop his way to becoming an eye doctor.
meanings.sent4: The rain eyedropped onto the windshield, making it hard to see.
meanings.sent5: She skillfully eyedroped the solution into her eye without blinking.
